for (var name in keywords) {
    data.push({
        name: name,
        value: Math.sqrt(keywords[name])
    })
}

var maskImage = new Image();
maskImage.src = symbolUrl;

var option = {
    backgroundColor:'#020918',
    tooltip: {
        show: true
    },
    grid: {
        left: 0,
        bottom: 0,
        top: 0,
        right: 0,
    },
    xAxis: {
        type: "category",
        show: false
    },
    yAxis: {
        max: 100,
        show: false
    },
    series: [{
            zlevel: -1,
            type: 'pictorialBar',
            name: 'pictorial',
            silent: true,
            symbol: 'image://' + symbolUrl,
            symbolSize: ['75%', '84%'],
            symbolPosition: 'center',
            barWidth: '100%',
            barMaxWidth: '100%',
            itemStyle: {
                normal: {
                    opacity: 0.9
                }
            },
            data: [{
                value: 100
            }]
        },
        {
            type: 'wordCloud',
            sizeRange: [1, 220],
            rotationRange: [-30, 30],
            maskImage: maskImage,
            textPadding: 0,
            gridSize: 0,
            width: '75%',
            height: '84%',
            left: 'center',
            top: 'center',
            drawOutOfBound: false,
            textStyle: {
                normal: {
                    color: function() {
                        return 'rgb(' + [
                            Math.round(Math.random() * 160),
                            Math.round(Math.random() * 160),
                            Math.round(Math.random() * 160)
                        ].join(',') + ')';
                    }
                },
            },
            data: data
        }
    ]
};
